options.text:
My daily anchor
Same mug same moment, same me.

A precision test
I'm chasing god-tier crema.

A wild card
Depends who I wake up as today.

A shared ritual
Half the joy's in who I drink it with.

questions.text: When it comes to taste, you’re drawn to…

options.text:
Smooth and steady
the comfort playlist of coffee.

Bold and balanced
pure craft, zero shortcuts.

Whatever fits the mood
variety keeps things interesting.

The easy crowd-pleaser
hits the spot without overthinking it.

questions.text: When you’re at the machine, you…

options.text:
Geek out
pressure, grind, and tamp like it’s performance art.
Hit brew, zone out and trust the machine.

Treat it like a creative outlet
follow the recipe once, then make it yours.

Take everyone’s order
coffee diplomacy is your love language.

questions.text: When your cup hits the bench, it usually…

options.text:
Keeps it stripped-back
black, white, and effortlessly unfussy.

Looks engineered by NASA
precision, poise, serious intent.

Could start a micro-trend on TikTok
confident pour, main-character energy.

Feels like home
warm, familiar and a little nostalgic.

proofpoints.title: Dual Froth Technology
proofpoints.description: Dual Froth Technology creates perfectly textured microfoam for a rich, velvety mouthfeel.

proofpoints.title: Dual Froth Technology
proofpoints.description: Dual Froth System creates silky, café-quality microfoam for drinks as soft and sincere as you are.

proofpoints.title: 3-in-1 Machine
proofpoints.description: 3-in-1 machine allows you to create effortless espresso, rapid cold brew and perfectly balanced filter coffee - for every social occasion.

proofpoints.title: 3-in-1 Machine
proofpoints.description: 3-in-1 versatility lets you shift from bold espresso to smooth cold brew or easy drip, depending on the mood.

proofpoints.title: 3-in-1 Machine
proofpoints.description: Our 3-in-1 machine allows you to create the perfect well balanced espresso, rapid cold brew and perfectly balanced filter coffee.

proofpoints.title: 3-in-1 Machine
proofpoints.description: Our 3-in-1 machine allows you to create the perfect well balanced espresso, rapid cold brew and perfectly balanced filter coffee.

proofpoints.title: 3-in-1 Machine
proofpoints.description: 3-in-1 versatility lets you share whatever’s next — espresso martinis, cold brew, or a classic pour.

proofpoints.title: Multiple Drink Presets
proofpoints.description: Multiple drink presets give you the flexibility for many drink styles without manual dialing.

proofpoints.title: Weight-based Dosing
proofpoints.description: Weight-based dosing and time-based extraction let you dial in the perfect shot, every time. Whilst four froth presets allow you to customise your drink to your taste.

proofpoints.title: Weight-based Dosing
proofpoints.description: Weight-based dosing and time-based extraction lets you dial in the perfect shot, every time.

proofpoints.title: Barista Assist Technology
proofpoints.description: Barista Assist Technology™ takes out the guesswork, guiding you from grind size to extraction for café-quality comfort, cup after cup.

proofpoints.title: Barista Assist Technology
proofpoints.description: Barista Assist Technology™ takes out the guesswork, guiding you from grind size to extraction for perfectly consistent results.

proofpoints.title: Multiple Drink Presets
proofpoints.description: With 15+ preset drink options and 4 versatile froth settings, you can create shared moments with effortless consistency.

proofpoints.title: Barista Assist Technology
proofpoints.description: Barista Assist Technology™ and intelligent temperature control auto-calibrate to deliver the perfect brew and froth every time.

proofpoints.title: Barista Assist Technology
proofpoints.description: Barista Assist Technology™ takes out the guesswork, guiding you from grind size to extraction for café-quality comfort, cup after cup.

proofpoints.title: Barista Assist Technology
proofpoints.description: Ninja Luxe Café redefines the at-home coffee ritual. With Barista Assist Technology™ guiding every step — from grind size and tamping to time-based dosing and hands-free frothing — your daily brew becomes a moment of pure zen.

precisionist.title:
The
precisionist
precisionist.description1:
You know perfection doesn’t happen by accident — it happens one micro-adjustment at a time. 
You’re the type to notice when the crema’s two seconds late.

optimiser.title:
The
optimiser
optimiser.description1: You can’t leave well enough alone — and that’s the point. You tweak, refine, and shave seconds until routine becomes art.

roastician.title:
The
roastician
roastician.description1:
You don’t follow recipes — you follow feeling. 
You trust your nose, your timing, your gut, and somehow the magic always lands in the cup.

baristocrat.title:
The
baristocrat
baristocrat.description1:
You’re all polish and preference — a little ceremony, a lot of confidence. 
Refinement isn’t an act; it’s how you wake up.

classicist.title:
The
classicist
classicist.description1:
You trust tradition over trends — believing that quality endures and restraint is its own reward. 
You trust tradition over trends — believing that quality endures and restraint is its own reward.

smooth_operator.title:
The
smooth operator
smooth_operator.description1:
You keep everything humming — steady tempo, effortless flow. 
Nothing flusters you; every pour feels like muscle memory.

brewsmith.title:
The
brewsmith
brewsmith.description1:
You trust your hands and your tools. 
For you, craft is care — process is the point, and control is comfort.

home_brewer.title:
The
home brewer
home_brewer.description1:
You make coffee the heart of your home — warm, familiar, and always ready to share. 
Your kitchen smells like belonging.

zen_brewer.title:
The
zen brewer
zen_brewer.description1:
You find calm in motion — patient, present, and precise. 
The process is your meditation; the pour, your pause.

mood_swinger.title:
The
mood swinger
mood_swinger.description1:
No rules, just vibes. You brew by instinct — espresso at dawn, cold brew at noon, maybe an affogato for dinner.  
Consistency’s overrated anyway.

blendsetter.title:
The
blendsetter
blendsetter.description1:
You see coffee as a canvas — remixing, experimenting, setting the tone before anyone else catches on. 
Innovation’s just your comfort zone.

ritualist.title:
The
ritualist
ritualist.tagline: Same time, same place, same joy.
ritualist.description1: For you, coffee isn’t just a drink — it’s an anchor. You find calm in consistency, comfort in repetition, and strength in keeping the ritual alive.

everybuddy.title:
The
everybuddy
everybuddy.description1: You make coffee a social ritual — the chat before work, the refill that becomes a catch-up, the reason to linger just a bit longer.

percolator.title:
The
percolator
percolator.description1:
You’re the energy source — warm, curious, always connecting people over a pour. 
When you’re around, the conversation never runs dry.

beanfluencer.title:
The
beanfluencer
beanfluencer.tagline: Social by nature, caffeinated by choice.
beanfluencer.description1:
You know what’s trending before it’s poured — talkative, tuned-in, contagiously upbeat. 
You don’t just make coffee; you make it a movement.

brewmantic.title:
The
brewmantic
brewmantic.description1:
You pour your heart into every cup, the way some people write love letters. 
A swirl of nostalgia, a dash of foam, and suddenly the morning feels cinematic.
